name: Happy Horse
description:
Avoid clouds and lightning while you fly the Happy Horse.

Fun for all ages.
How far will you get?

Seasonal themes:
- Halloween (October 24th to November 9th).
- Winter (December 1st to March 1st)
- Holidays (December 15th to January 4th)

Other features:
- Challenge your friends on Game Center leaderboards.
- Game Center reaches across iOS and Mac (regular and lite) for version 1.3 and beyond.
- Optional game mode with magical abilities and a separate high score.
- No popup advertising
- No in game purchases needed
- No registration needed


If you like this app or have any comments or suggestions please review it and leave us a note.

Hope you enjoy it :)
